hero.headline: Unlock your vehicle's true potential with professional ECU tuning and advanced car coding services. Experience enhanced performance, efficiency, and customization.

featuredService.label: Our Services
featuredService.title: Vehicle Coding
featuredService.description: CarPlay/Android Auto activation, updating and unlocking new maps on multimedia, additional functions and personalization of your vehicle according to your needs.
featuredService.description2: Activation and configuration of virtual dashboards, digital displays and head-up display systems.
featuredService.description3: CarPlay/Android Auto activation, audio system configuration, adding new multimedia features and infotainment system personalization.
featuredService.description4: Ambient lighting, light configuration, dynamic light activation, LED setups and personalization of interior and exterior lighting.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive car coding solutions tailored to enhance your vehicle's performance, efficiency, and functionality.

navigation.title: Navigation / Maps
navigation.description: Activation and updates of navigation systems, unlocking new maps on multimedia, GPS configuration and navigation functions for optimal driving.

multimedia.title: Multimedia / Infotainment
multimedia.description: CarPlay/Android Auto activation, audio system configuration, adding new multimedia features and infotainment system personalization.

virtualDashboards.title: Virtual Dashboards / Displays
virtualDashboards.description: Activation and configuration of virtual dashboards, digital displays, head-up display systems and advanced information panels.

lighting.title: Lighting
lighting.description: Ambient lighting, light configuration, dynamic light activation, LED setups and personalization of interior and exterior lighting.

security.title: Security
security.description: Activation and configuration of security systems, parking sensors, cameras, alarm systems and advanced vehicle security features.

comfort.title: Comfort
comfort.description: Climate control settings, memory seats, automatic windows, central locking and other comfort features for optimal driving experience.

performance.title: Engine / Performance
performance.description: ECU remapping, chip tuning, engine performance optimization, increased power and torque while maintaining vehicle reliability.

about.title: Why Choose CARCODE?
about.subtitle: We are dedicated to providing the highest quality car coding and ECU tuning services. Our team of experts combines technical expertise with a passion for automotive excellence.
about.feature3: Support for all major vehicle brands

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to enhance your vehicle? Contact us today for a consultation and discover how we can help unlock your car's potential.
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.
